column2: {% for currency in currencies %}{% if valuations|get_dict_key:key_date|get_dict_key:'invested'|get_dict_key:currency and valuations|get_dict_key:key_date|get_dict_key:'invested'|get_dict_key:currency != 0.0 %}{{valuations|get_dict_key:key_date|get_dict_key:'invested'|get_dict_key:currency|floatformat:2}}{% else %}-{% endif %}
column5: {% for currency in currencies %}{% if valuations|get_dict_key:key_date|get_dict_key:'cash'|get_dict_key:currency|get_dict_key:'account' != 0.0 %}{{valuations|get_dict_key:key_date|get_dict_key:'cash'|get_dict_key:currency|get_dict_key:'account'|floatformat:2}} {% if container.currency.short_name != currency %}({{valuations|get_dict_key:key_date|get_dict_key:'spot_pf'|get_dict_key:currency|floatformat:6}}){% endif %}{% else %}-{% endif %}
